Ni prabhuvu yokka konni (bahiranga) nidarsanalu vacce rojuna, purvam visvasincakunda a rojuna visvasincina vyaktiki, leda visvasinci kuda e mancini sampadincukoni vyaktiki, tana visvasam valla (a roju) e prayojanam cekuradu.
